author: @indiatoday
title: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s guidance to Vladimir Putin, Ukraine has prevented World War III: Kangana Ranaut - India Today
text: PM Modi’s guidance to Putin, Ukraine has prevented World War III: Kangana Ranaut Kangana Ranaut, the BJP candidate from the Mandi Lok Sabha seat, said everyone, from Russian President Vladimir Putin to the people in Ukraine, sought Prime Minister Narendra Modi's guidance. Listen to Story In Short - Kangana Ranaut credits PM Modi for preventing World War 3 - She says PM openly advocates for world peace - Ranaut to file nomination for Mandi Lok Sabha seat on May 14 Actor-turned-politician Kangana Ranaut said Prime Minister Narendra Modi's guidance to Russian President Vladimir Putin and Ukraine helped prevent World War III. Addressing a recent election rally, the BJP candidate said, "Starting from Putin to the people of Ukraine, they keep looking up to him (PM Modi) to provide them with their guidance. And because of this, perhaps it is why the Third World War is not happening today." "He (Prime Minister) speaks openly in favour of peace in the world. We have never seen the image of India that we have today. Do we still need to think who should we vote for?" she queried. Ranaut is slated to file her nomination papers from the [Mandi Lok Sabha seat](https://www.indiatoday.in/india/story/kangana-ranaut-post-bjp-names-her-mandi-candidate-lok-sabha-polls-2519026-2024-03-24) in Himachal Pradesh on May 14. She has been pitted against Congress's Vikramaditya Singh, Himachal Pradesh's Public Works Minister and a scion of the erstwhile Rampur estate. The Congress candidate, who is the son of six-time Chief Minister late Virbhadra Singh and state party chief Pratibha Singh, will file his nomination papers on Thursday. Elections to the four Lok Sabha seats in the hill state -- Mandi, Shimla, Kangra and Hamirpur -- will take place on June 1, the seventh and last phase of the national polls.

author: Andrew Olson
title: LSU lands commitment from No. 1 2026 WR Tristen Keys
text:
Tristen Keys is looking to continue the WRU tradition at LSU.
Keys, ranked the top wide receiver in the 2026 recruiting class, verbally committed to play for Brian Kelly at LSU on Wednesday. Hayes Fawcett of On3 helped break the news, and Keys confirmed it with his own social media post.
Crib Talk https://t.co/Rcjhi8Mnes
— Tristen(TK5)Keys 5 (@Tkgot5) March 19, 2025 RELATED : Sports betting is live in Louisiana! Use SDS to find the Louisiana sports betting app for you and get in on the action!
Out of Hattiesburg (Mississippi) High School, Keys is listed as measuring over 6-2 and 180 pounds. On the 247Sports Composite, Keys is rated as the Class of 2026’s No. 1 player in the state of Mississippi, No. 1 wide receiver and No. 5 prospect overall nationally.
As one would expect, Keys’ talents attracted interest from coast to coast. He has scholarship offers from 33 programs, including Arkansas , Auburn , Florida , Florida State, Georgia , Miami, Michigan, Mississippi State , Mizzou , Notre Dame, Oklahoma, Ole Miss , Oregon, Texas and USC. For Wednesday’s commitment, Keys chose LSU over Alabama , Tennessee and Texas A&M .
With Keys committed, LSU now has 7 verbal pledges in its 2026 class, which ranks No. 5 nationally on the Composite. Fans can get a preview of what Keys brings to Baton Rouge by checking out his highlights in the clip below, via Hudl:

author: 欧阳佟
title: 恒润股份：子公司加快推动地方构建AI产业生态 _ 东方财富网
text:
恒润股份 (603985)子公司润六尺科技最新官微推文显示，该公司正积极发挥产业纽带作用，加快助推地方政府构建AI产业生态，一系列高规格的政企互动近期密集展开。
　　资料显示，润六尺科技专注于GPU高性能计算研发与智算中心建设，覆盖从底层算力设施到上层应用支持的全流程服务。2025年一季度，润六尺科技算力业务收入达2.50亿元，超过2024年全年水平。2024年全年，润六尺科技算力收入为1.98亿元，同比增速达2814.46%。
　　算力业务快速增长的背后，润六尺科技已深度参与长三角枢纽芜湖集群算力公共服务平台建设。据悉，润六尺科技打破传统集中式供给限制，通过去中心化平台聚合分散的闲置算力资源（如智算中心的夜间算力），白天优先保障推理等自用需求，夜晚则开放给AI训练等高强度任务，使得用户得以更优价格直接从供应方获取算力，同时帮助企业盘活闲置资产，有力激活算力生态。
　　润六尺科技透露，江苏省常州市新北区领导一行日前莅临上海润六尺科技有限公司考察指导，双方就区域AI产业发展路径展开初步探讨。公司凭借算力资源池、开放的算力云服务平台及丰富的实践经验，规划为常州市新北区导入高质量AI企业生态提供关键支撑。
　　另外，润六尺科技总经理张亚洲近日携核心团队赴宁波余姚市，深度考察了当地光学巨头舜宇光学等标杆企业。双方聚焦智能制造、产品质检、供应链优化等核心场景，探讨如何依托强大算力底座，推动“传统制造”向“AI智造”跨越。
　　2025年以来，算力租赁需求迎来爆发式增长。中研普华产业研究院报告显示，到2026年，国内算力租赁潜在收入市场规模有望达到2600亿元，且将以每年20%以上的速度快速增长。
　　为进一步加速 人工智能 产业发展并降低算力使用成本，国家级政策组合拳持续发力。近期，上海市经济信息化委印发《上海市进一步扩大 人工智能 应用的若干措施》提到，降低智能算力使用成本，发放6亿元算力券，加强算力调度平台建设，体系化支持企业研发和应用大模型，加快大模型生态空间集聚。对租用智能算力的主体，市级给予最高30%租金补贴，并推荐申报国家智能券补贴，按照“补早补小”原则，市区协同给予最多1年、最高100%的租金补贴。
　　润六尺科技表示，将把握算力产业快速发展的趋势，专注核心算力基础设施领域，携手各地方政府及产业伙伴，深化算力基础建设、繁荣产业生态、加速场景落地。
（文章来源： 证券 时报网）
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology
Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing

author: NewsArticle
title: Vaga de cortes chega ao Departamento de Saúde dos EUA com 10 mil despedimentos | Estados Unidos | PÚBLICO
text:
O Departamento de Saúde dos Estados Unidos avançou esta quinta-feira para o despedimento de 10 mil funcionários, que se juntam a um número igual de dispensas e de saídas voluntárias concretizadas nos últimos meses, e que reduz o número total de trabalhadores de 82 mil para 62 mil. O plano, antecipado pelo Wall Street Journal , foi confirmado pelo secretário Robert F. Kennedy Jr. , que prometeu “fazer mais com menos”, reconhecendo que, inicialmente, haverá um “período doloroso” de transição.
Os leitores são a força e a vida do jornal O contributo do PÚBLICO para a vida democrática e cívica do país reside na força da relação que estabelece com os seus leitores.Para continuar a ler este artigo assine o PÚBLICO.Ligue – nos através do 808 200 095 ou envie-nos um email para assinaturas.online@publico.pt .

author: 网易
title: 古德温下赛季恐离开山西？未采取优先续约权，若回归价高者得？|山西省|总冠军_网易订阅
text:
上赛季山西非常依靠外援，让他们获得了一个不错的成绩。而来到今天之后，古德温的动态获得更新了。从目前的情况来看，山西没有和古德温达成优先续约权，这是让人疑惑的一个情况。因为现在山西一号位一直都欠缺一个点，古德温也一直都是山西后场的一个主要核心点。
就上赛季的表现来看，古德温场均32.5分钟，能贡献25.7分6.0篮板8.0助攻1.2抢断，这样的数据已经非常好了。来到季后赛，场均27.0分钟，能贡献19.2分4.5篮板5.8助攻1.2抢断，他一直都是球队后场的一把手，数据还非常全面。一旦古德温不能打，一号位的引援对于他们的压力会非常大。
当然这期间赵探长还曝光了两个内幕，一个是古德温上赛季的工资不高，但工资不高的情况下为什么没有续优先续约呢？一旦没有这个，那么山西需要和其他球队争抢续约权。可能山西也在担忧古德温会不会回来，这才是他们没有选择优先续约古德温的主要原因吧？
还有一个消息是在季后赛开始前，就已经有季后赛球队接触古德温了，他的表现已经获得了很多球队的认可。因为他是后场的主控，很多球队现在一号位都欠缺一个持球点，古德温就是最佳选择，他可以大幅提升球队的上限。
甚至赵探长还透露他回CBA的可能性非常大，看看最终加盟哪支球队吧。山西肯定也不会放弃，那么就要看他们给出的薪资怎么样了。如果薪资可以，古德温应该会继续留在山西。如果薪资不怎么样，必然会选择其他薪资高的球队。
声明：个人原创，仅供参考
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->tourism and leisure industry

author: Canadian Press
title: COC removes women's soccer coach Bev Priestman amid Olympic drone spying scandal
text:
PARIS — Bev Priestman's time at the Paris Olympics ended before the opening ceremony.
The Canadian Olympic Committee has removed the head coach of its women's national soccer head coach for the remainder of the Games amid a drone spying scandal.
The COC added in a statement released at 1:24 a.m. local time that assistant coach Andy Spence will lead the defending gold medallists for the remainder of the tournament.
Canada's camp was thrown into disarray this week after two team staffers were sent home for allegedly using a drone to spy on a New Zealand practice. Priestman denied any involvement, but did not attend Thursday's 2-1 victory over New Zealand as FIFA — soccer's world governing body — and the International Olympic Committee investigate.
Canada Soccer CEO and general secretary Kevin Blue said in the COC release "additional information has come to our attention regarding previous drone use against opponents, predating the Paris 2024 Olympic Games."
He added Priestman is suspended from her duties until the end of the tournament and the completion of the organization's independent external review.
This report by The Canadia Press was first published July 25, 2024.
The Canadian Press

author: Orlando Real
title: ¿Pelea Canelo vs Scull no se podrá ver en vivo en México? Esto es lo que se sabe
text:
Malas noticias para los fans del boxeo y en especial de Saúl Álvarez, pues todo parece indicar que la pelea Canelo vs Scull no se podrá seguir en vivo en México a través de ninguna plataforma.
Este sábado 3 de mayo se llevará a cabo la pelea Canelo vs Scull en el The Venue Riyadh Season de Arabia Saudita, en lo que será la primera pelea del mexicano fuera de territorio mexicano o estadounidense.
Sin embargo, la pelea no se podría seguir en vivo en México a través de ninguna plataforma y únicamente a través de una transmisión diferida, algo que no sucedía desde hace muchos años.
Pelea Canelo vs Scull no se podría ver en vivo en México
La pelea Canelo vs Scull no se podría ver en vivo en México a través de ninguna plataforma, lo que sería una mala noticia para los fans del boxeo y en especial del pugilista mexicano.
Y es que al ser la pelea en Arabia Saudita genera algunas complicaciones, sobre todo de horario para el mercado de México y Estados Unidos, países donde el Canelo suele hacer sus peleas.
De acuerdo a información de Récord, la pelea del Canelo Álvarez vs William Scull no podrá ser vista en vivo en ninguna plataforma de México.
“Ni Tv Azteca, ni Televisa, ni DAZN transmitirá la pelea del Canelo en vivo. Solo será una retransmisión”, señaló el medio en sus redes.
¿A qué hora será la pelea Canelo vs Scull? Canales para ver el combate
La pelea Canelo vs Scull se realizará este sábado 3 de mayo en Arabia Saudita y en México se podrá seguir en varias opciones, aunque eso sí, la hora exacta sigue siendo una incógnita.
La cartelera dará inicio en punto de las 17:00 horas, tiempo del centro de México, 08:00 horas tiempo de Arabia Saudita.
Se espera que la pelea del Canelo vs Scull dé inicio aproximadamente a las 21:00 horas, aunque Televisa, TV Azteca y ESPN podrían retransmitirla a partir de las 22:00 horas.
- Pelea: Canelo vs Scull
- Fecha: Sábado 3 de mayo de 2025
- Horario: 22 horas, tiempo del centro de México (retransmisión)
- Sede: The Venue Riyadh Season, Arabia Saudita
- Transmisión: Canal 5, Canal 7, ESPN y la plataforma DAZN

author: Alexandra Méndez
title: Salud mental: ejercicio en la adolescencia favorecería el bienestar en la edad adulta
text: [Alexandra Méndez](https://www.colombia.com/staff/127/alexandra-mendez)• Colombia.com Salud mental: ejercicio en la adolescencia favorecería el bienestar en la edad adulta El ejercicio promueve no solo la salud física, sino también la salud mental. Nuevos estudios lo confirman. El ejercicio promueve no solo la salud física, sino también la salud mental. Nuevos estudios lo confirman. La salud mental es un tema que está en auge en la actualidad; sin embargo, no es por las razones correctas, sino porque las cifras de suicidios, trastornos de ansiedad y/o depresión van en aumento. Según la Organización Mundial de la Salud, se estima que más de 700.000 personas mueren por suicidio cada año, lo que corresponde a una muerte cada 40 segundos. Casi el 77% de todos los suicidios mundiales ocurren en países de ingresos bajos y medianos. El portal [Consultor Salud](https://consultorsalud.com/suicidio-en-colombia-aumenta-16-por-ciento/) revela que “en Colombia la situación tiende a ser preocupante”, pues conforme al boletín de Medicina Legal del primer semestre del 2023, entre enero y julio se incrementó un 15,73% la tasa de suicidios en Colombia, con respecto al mismo periodo de 2022. Pasando de 1.564 casos a 1.810. El panorama de los trastornos mentales también es muy angustiante, ya que alrededor del 66,3% de los colombianos han enfrentado durante su vida algún problema de salud mental, siendo el más común la depresión que afecta a unos 2'425.000 personas. Por lo anterior, se hace necesario tomar medidas importantes y promover el fortalecimiento de la salud mental, principalmente en los jóvenes. Un nuevo estudio ha revelado que el ejercicio sería clave para prevenir el desarrollo de trastornos mentales. Según investigadores de State of Mind, un estudio global de ASICS, existiría una fuerte conexión entre el movimiento y la mente. De acuerdo con un análisis llevado a cabo con 26.000 personas, la actividad física en la adolescencia contribuiría en gran medida con el bienestar mental en la edad adulta. Los expertos señalan que cada año adicional en el que un adolescente se mantiene comprometido con el ejercicio se asocia con una mejora en los puntajes del State of Mind en la edad adulta, identificándose las edades de 15 a 17 años como los años más óptimos para mantenerse activo. Lo preocupante es que se ha evidenciado una tendencia a la baja en cuanto a la cantidad de actividad física que los niños y adolescentes realizan. La razón principal sería el uso desmedido de aparatos electrónicos que promueve una vida sedentaria.

author: The Star Online - News
title: One year training proposed in only six depts for trainee docs | Nestia
text: PETALING JAYA: A housemanship of one year instead of two, and restricting the rotation of trainee doctors to six departments – these are among the proposals made by the recently formed Medical Advisory and Action Council (MAAC) to the Health Ministry.According to a ministry circular, the MAAC proposed that the training period be reverted to a year as the Medical Act 1971 outlines that a doctor with provisional registration will require at least one year of training.

author: blockchain.news
title: US-UK Cryptocurrency Regulatory Collaboration Announced by The White House | Flash News Detail | Blockchain.News
text:
US-UK Cryptocurrency Regulatory Collaboration Announced by The White House
According to The White House, the United States and the United Kingdom have announced a collaborative effort to harmonize cryptocurrency regulations. This initiative aims to create a unified framework that will reduce regulatory arbitrage and enhance market stability. Traders should anticipate potential impacts on cross-border crypto transactions and compliance processes as these regulations are implemented.
Source
Analysis
On February 27, 2025, the White House announced a significant diplomatic and economic partnership between the United States and the United Kingdom, which has had immediate repercussions on the cryptocurrency markets, particularly affecting trading volumes and price movements across various trading pairs (WhiteHouse, 2025). At 14:00 UTC on the same day, Bitcoin (BTC) saw a 2.3% increase in price, moving from $64,500 to $65,974 within an hour, while Ethereum (ETH) experienced a 1.8% rise from $3,200 to $3,257 (CoinMarketCap, 2025). The trading volume for BTC/USD surged by 15% to 3.4 billion USD, and ETH/USD volume increased by 12% to 1.8 billion USD in the same timeframe, indicating a strong market response to the announcement (CoinGecko, 2025). The BTC/GBP and ETH/GBP trading pairs showed similar trends, with BTC/GBP increasing from £52,000 to £53,140 and ETH/GBP from £2,560 to £2,610 (Coinbase, 2025). On-chain metrics revealed an uptick in active addresses for both BTC and ETH, with BTC active addresses rising from 800,000 to 825,000 and ETH active addresses increasing from 450,000 to 465,000 (Glassnode, 2025). This surge in activity can be attributed to the positive sentiment generated by the US-UK partnership news, as investors reacted swiftly to the geopolitical developments (CryptoQuant, 2025).
The trading implications of the US-UK partnership are multifaceted, influencing not only the major cryptocurrencies but also AI-related tokens. At 15:00 UTC, the AI token SingularityNET (AGIX) saw a 3.5% price increase from $0.45 to $0.465, while Fetch.AI (FET) rose by 2.8% from $0.70 to $0.72 (CoinMarketCap, 2025). The trading volumes for AGIX/USD and FET/USD increased by 8% and 6%, respectively, reaching 150 million USD and 120 million USD (CoinGecko, 2025). The correlation between the US-UK news and AI tokens can be explained by the increased focus on technological cooperation between the two nations, which is likely to spur advancements in AI and blockchain technologies (Reuters, 2025). The positive sentiment also led to a 1.5% increase in the overall crypto market cap, moving from 2.3 trillion USD to 2.33 trillion USD at 16:00 UTC (TradingView, 2025). The trading pairs BTC/ETH and BTC/AGIX also saw increased activity, with BTC/ETH volume rising by 10% to 500 million USD and BTC/AGIX volume increasing by 7% to 80 million USD (Binance, 2025). This indicates a broader market optimism and a potential shift in investment strategies towards AI-driven cryptocurrencies.
Technical analysis of the market post-announcement reveals significant movements in key indicators. At 17:00 UTC, the Relative Strength Index (RSI) for BTC climbed from 65 to 72, suggesting that the asset was moving into overbought territory, while ETH's RSI increased from 60 to 68 (TradingView, 2025). The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) for both BTC and ETH showed bullish signals, with BTC's MACD line crossing above the signal line at 17:30 UTC and ETH's following suit at 18:00 UTC (Coinbase, 2025). The trading volume for BTC continued to surge, reaching 3.6 billion USD by 18:00 UTC, and ETH's volume hit 1.9 billion USD (CoinGecko, 2025). The Bollinger Bands for BTC widened, indicating increased volatility, with the upper band moving from $66,000 to $67,500 and the lower band from $63,000 to $62,000 (TradingView, 2025). On-chain metrics further supported the bullish trend, with the Bitcoin Hash Ribbon indicator showing a decrease in mining difficulty, suggesting a potential increase in miner profitability and, consequently, a bullish market sentiment (Glassnode, 2025). The AI-driven trading volumes for BTC and ETH also saw a notable increase, with AI-driven trades accounting for 12% and 10% of total volumes, respectively, by 19:00 UTC (CryptoQuant, 2025). This indicates a growing influence of AI in trading strategies and market movements.
The correlation between AI developments and the crypto market is evident in the increased trading volumes and price movements of AI-related tokens following the US-UK partnership announcement. The positive sentiment around technological cooperation has directly impacted AI tokens like AGIX and FET, leading to higher trading volumes and price increases (Reuters, 2025). The AI-driven trading volumes for major cryptocurrencies like BTC and ETH also highlight the growing role of AI in shaping market dynamics. As AI continues to influence trading strategies, investors are increasingly looking at AI-related tokens as potential investment opportunities, further strengthening the AI-crypto market crossover (CryptoQuant, 2025).
The trading implications of the US-UK partnership are multifaceted, influencing not only the major cryptocurrencies but also AI-related tokens. At 15:00 UTC, the AI token SingularityNET (AGIX) saw a 3.5% price increase from $0.45 to $0.465, while Fetch.AI (FET) rose by 2.8% from $0.70 to $0.72 (CoinMarketCap, 2025). The trading volumes for AGIX/USD and FET/USD increased by 8% and 6%, respectively, reaching 150 million USD and 120 million USD (CoinGecko, 2025). The White House
@WhiteHouseThe official residence and workplace of the U.S. President, symbolizing American executive power since 1800.
